name: Paraslayer
description: In this crazy & smooth shoot-em up game, where the player has no control over their weapon, fight hordes of deadly ghosts and even your own bullets as the stage slowly descends into an uncontrolled state of madness.  Survive and kill for as long as you can, with the only companion you have by your side; A shield that deflects bullets with a nice sprinkle of slow-motion.
